data.name: Two Falls (Nishu Takuatshina)
data.detailed_description:
Two Falls (Nishu Takuatshina) is a narrative-driven game that lets you live the intertwining journeys of Jeanne, a shipwrecked girl stranded far from the French colonies, and Maikan, a young Innu forced to travel west when his people are afflicted with a strange illness.



As each struggles to survive the wilderness of 17th Century Canada, their contrasting perspectives will inform their encounters with the denizens of this divided land. Your choices will shape their respective paths, but the actions of one may have consequences for the other…

A Note: This game is made by a team which includes many indigenous creators and the content is being validated by a Council of Elders in Canada.

IMMERSE YOURSELF IN CANADA'S WILDERNESS


In Two Falls, you will become fully immersed in the wild territories of Canada through the perspective of the two characters, uncovering their realities, their culture, and their way to understand life. For Maikan, the land is alive and familiar. He moves with ease through the forest and recognizes animals and plants. For Jeanne, everything is new, unfamiliar, scary and strange...the forest is full of unknown dangers.

LIVE THE STORY THROUGH MULTIPLE PERSPECTIVES


All stories can be interpreted in many different ways, and Two Falls is no exception. Throughout the game, uncover and interpret different events from Maikan or Jeanne’s point of view. You will soon realize that one event can have very different meanings for them, eventually finding yourself doubting your own beliefs.

MAKE YOUR DECISIONS MATTER


Decide how to interact with the environment, interpret an event or react to another character's actions, and shape how Jeanne and Maikan grow throughout the game. You will live the emotions they feel as they grasp the fact that the world they once knew will never be the same. Every decisions will have a great impact on the story!

INCLUDES


  • A stunningly beautiful wilderness environment that evolves through your choices.
  • A tailor-made story: the choices you make will shape the characters and send them in different paths
  • A mysterious land where fiction and fantasy merge with reality - although, is any of this real?

FEATURES


  • Lush painterly environments with different feels and vibe
  • Living, breathing characters that takes life in cinematic-like scenes
  • A dramatic story strongly driven by the characters and the choices they make
  • An original soundtrack created by indigenous musicians and singers
  • An evolving environment reflecting the character’s growth

data.short_description: Immerse yourself in the harsh wilderness of 17th century Canada through the eyes of Maikan, a young Innu, and Jeanne, a French woman who crossed the Atlantic to start a new life. Decide how the characters will survive, and watch the impact of your choices unfold in this coming-of-age story!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core or faster
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible, 256 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz Dual Core or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible, 512 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 compatible
